function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher proportion of older persons limiting the spread of the virus","Impact":"Potential limitation of virus spread may lead to underestimation and negligence of virus control measures","Mitigation":"Implement targeted measures to protect older population while still controlling the virus spread","Technologies":"Remote health monitoring, telemedicine, and digital communication for elderly care","People":"Older population","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and community organizations"},{"Description":"Prevalence of widespread diseases like COPD and heart failure not influencing the number of cases at an ecological level","Impact":"Underestimation of the impact of chronic diseases on virus propagation, leading to inadequate preparedness and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Integrate chronic disease management into the overall virus control strategy, focusing on vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Intelligent monitoring systems for chronic disease management, predictive analytics for healthcare resource allocation","People":"Patients with chronic diseases, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health organizations, healthcare institutions"}]}
